snippet: Indiana moved past Atlanta and took a 3-2 lead in the Eastern Conference playoff series. The Houston Rockets beat the Oklahoma City Thunder in the Western Conference series to 3-2.
abstract: Indiana Pacers defeat Atlanta Hawks, 106-83, and Houston Rockets defeat Oklahoma City Thunder, 107-100; Pacers and Rockets both lead their first-round playoff series, 3-2.
lead_paragraph: Indiana moved past Atlanta and took a 3-2 lead in the Eastern Conference playoff series. The Houston Rockets beat the Oklahoma City Thunder in the Western Conference series to 3-2.
